musictree.midi

class musictree.midi.Midi(value: Union[float, int], accidental: Optional[musictree.accidental.Accidental] = None, *args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: musictree.core.MusicTree

Midi is the representation of a Pitch with its midi value, and accidental sign. This object is used to create a Chord consisting of one or more pitches. The midi representation of a rest is a Midi object with value 0.

update_parent_note()[source]
update_pitch_or_rest()[source]
property accidental
property octave
property parent_note
property value
property name

:returns a string like C#3 consisting of stem, accidental sign (or value) and octave. Midi with value 0 returns ‘rest’ as its name.

get_pitch_or_rest() → Union[musicxml.xmlelement.xmlelement.XMLPitch, musicxml.xmlelement.xmlelement.XMLRest][source]
Returns

XMLPitch with appropriate children.

transpose(val: float) → musictree.midi.Midi[source]

Adds val to value and returns self

class musictree.midi.MidiNote(octave, accidental_sign=None, *args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: musictree.midi.Midi

Parent class of shorthand midi names: C, D, E, F, G, A, B. Example C(4, ‘#’) = C(4, ‘sharp’) = C(4, sharp)
